content.question: Two nonzero vectors are parallel. Which of the following describes the relationship between these vectors?

choices.label: The dot product of one vector with the other must equal <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math>.
The dot product of one vector with the other must equal <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math>.
The components of one vector must be nonzero multiples of the components of the other vector.
The magnitude of one vector must be the same as the magnitude of the other vector.

content.answer: The components of one vector must be nonzero multiples of the components of the other vector.

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
